question: Help me with my puberty!?
question_content: Does any signs of pubes mean u started puberty im 13 and i have around 50' hair and there black and a centimeter long.. and on my triangle i have these white dots and they have realky hard hair very gery small visible only by me and they are clear and whitish help have i started?

answers.answer_content: Of course you started puberty. I'm 13 too, and as far as I can tell, I've grown alot of pubic hair as well. But as for those white dots, I'm not exactly sure what you mean. They might be ingrown hairs after you shave, or possibly pimples. Not so sure.
